channel.title: Simple but annoying problem
channel.description: Well, I am currently trying to do a Halloween event for my server, and you know the city of user or uzer the desert one, well under there is like a throne room and I need the coordinates from it, from shadow of the storm quest, I would be very thankful and Reputation + if you can get me Coord for the Throne room in Desert below city of uzer... 317 server
